column4: When I upgraded to Hardy a few weeks ago after I rebooted the computer I noticed that my bcm43xx wireless card's driver didn't automatically modprobe. But when I went and opened the blacklist the driver was there. What should I do to make it automattically modprobe like it did on Gutsy?
take it off the blacklist then
But I thought it was supposed to be on the blacklist. If it is on the blacklist isn't it supposed to automatically be modprobed when you boot up the computer and start Ubuntu?
do u want it to be loaded or not?
